title: Border Anomaly Detection
description: An analyst must review wide-area motion imagery (WAMI) to detect anomalous activity along a monitored border.

tasks.description: Analyze historical WAMI data to establish a baseline pattern of normal activity (e.g., traffic flow, civilian movement).
tasks.expected_outcome: Analyst successfully establishes a pattern of life for the area.

tasks.description: Monitor the live WAMI feed and compare it against the established baseline.
tasks.expected_outcome: Analyst monitors the feed for deviations.

tasks.description: Flag a vehicle that stops in an unusual location and at an unusual time as a potential anomaly requiring further investigation.
tasks.expected_outcome: Analyst correctly identifies an activity that deviates from the norm.
